v-gauge/options.description: GaugeJS render options, check gaugejs api http://bernii.github.io/gauge.js/

v-gauge/height.description: height of the gauge in pixels

v-gauge/initialValue.description: Initial value to display on the Gauge

v-gauge/minValue.description: Min value for the gauge to display

v-gauge/maxValue.description: Max value for the gauge to display

v-gauge/decimalPlace.description: Show decimal place values to which extent

v-gauge/top.description: To have the gauge value on top of the gauge

v-gauge/gaugeValueClass.description: Class to apply to gauge value (Must use /deep/ in css selector)
